text: A quiet and serene place for memorial niches. Especially during Easter and Good Friday.

A peaceful and well established resting place for Christians.
The new underground memorial is air-conditioning with good calming atmosphere with soft Christian music playing in the background.

A magnificent and serene resting place for those in their final journey. Plse take note that All Saints Home Hougang ( All Saints Memorial Chapel ) is different from All Saints Church in Bedok. Both are all Protestant Churches  but All Saints Home belongs to the Presbyterian Sect whereas the All Saints Church belongs to the Anglican Sect.

I like how serene this place is and had even hung out at the air-conditioned basement columbarium to study for a test after visiting the niches of some of my relatives. ðŸ˜‚ That said, it can be a little scary to hear groans coming from the living in the nursing home located on the same premises. ðŸ˜…

The facility is very quiet and serene and is wonderful for reflection. what it lacks is wheelchair accessibility for the elderly or disabled. suggest to consider installing an external lift for access to the second level. my mother is very sad that she is unable to visit my father's niche on the second level since he passed away in 2021. I am sure she is not the only one who faces this situation.
